website_summaries.verdict: A high quality set that offers a good variety at a decent price.
pros: Features 14 Forstner bits in sizes from 1/4 to 2 inches
Forstner bits have optimized cutting angles for flat bottom holes
Made of hardened steel for durability
Quality bits in a good variety of sizes
cons: The bits start out reasonably sharp, but dull after some use

customer_reviews.title: These work great, I've already made my money back
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what these bad reviews are talking about. These cut pencil shavings out of everything I put holes in which shows that they come plenty sharp. I have only used these on a couple projects so I cannot review on how long they will last, but I own a woodworking business and once I feel like they received a decent beating I will try and come back and review further. These aren't going to be the highest of quality forstner bits that you would get at a place like Rockler but they definitely do everything you want them to do. They cut great and they leave a smooth cut no Jagged edges and a smooth bottom
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Dull

customer_reviews.title: DULL IN 5 MINUTES
customer_reviews.text: These get dull in 5 minutes. I don't understand how so many people can give these bits such high reviews. I used a 1-1/4" bit on 1-1/2" pine using a drill press and the thing was totally dull by the third hole I drilled. There are a few other 1-star reviews that say the same thing. I read up on how to sharpen Forster bits, tried that since I paid $50 for the set, but saw marginal improvement. Do not buy unless you want to drill 2 holes per bit.
customer_reviews.author: sueokes02

customer_reviews.title: Great product despite mixed reviews
customer_reviews.text: I saw some mixed but this set seemed to be the most solid product in it's price range. Thankfully, I know that I have made the right choice. So far, the bits have managed to take my abuse of boring into both end-grain and cross-grain without skipping a beat. I think the bad reviews may be a factor of people not knowing that these bits require a slow speed. I set my drill press to its slowest speed (620 rpm) and I have had no issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Kurth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bits
customer_reviews.text: It is virtually impossible to find forstner bits locally so I ordered this set. The bits are very well made and consistently drill clean holes in all the woods I have tried them on. Mine are always used in my drill press, though you could probably use them in a portable drill is you take your time. Because of the way forstner bits cut,slower is better. Considering the variety in this kit, I consider it a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Morgan

customer_reviews.title: So dull they wouldn't cut butter
customer_reviews.text: These arrived today, couldn't wait to try them out. They are so dull none of them would cut through pine in a drill press. I can only imagine how hopeless they would be in oak. I ran my finger across the cutting edge and it was apparent they were never sharpened. Porter Cable, really? I would be ashamed to put my name on this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase if you need nice clean sharp bits
customer_reviews.text: The case is great the bits look like they never were sharpened. Very poor. Should look like a razor blade, not an old piece of metal!
customer_reviews.author: corey kondracki

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to buy this set, you should learn how to sharpen the bit first, I'm very dissatisfied with the quality of the product, don't recommend it at all, other people said it's very dull? Yes they are right.
customer_reviews.author: Red Fox

customer_reviews.title: Dull, Dull, Dull - Porter-Cable in name only...
customer_reviews.text: They say Porter-Cable, but that's where the quality ends. Every bit is dull and not even close to being properly sharpened. Sadly, I live in Costa Rica and have the product delivered to friends who brought with them when visiting. I literally had to use my dremel to sharpen a bit size I need in order to use it because it would not make a clean cut... which means a lot of strain on my drill press.
customer_reviews.author: Neyda

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I agree they aren't the highest quality and need an inspection with minor filing prior to use however I think I made a great choice for my first set of Forstner bits. I was trying to decide from other cheap sets and Freud (exclusively use there blades and happy with their value). I choose this set over the others primarily because they seemed to have the best reviews and largest range of sizes. Since I didn't know exactly what I was going to use them for (I only had a couple needs at the moment), I wanted quantity over quality. If needed I can always pick up a specific Freud size.
customer_reviews.author: John Phillip Hilbert

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE set of Forstner bits, in a well-designed case with carry handle.
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE set of Forstner bits, in a well-designed case with carry handle. Pleased with my purchase. They (the bits) appear well made and should suit my needs perfectly. The set includes virtually all the Forstner bit sizes I (and almost any woodworking "newbie") would need. The carry case appears at least appropriately rugged (enough to reasonably protect the bits from accidental damage). I feel theis item was a worthwile, cost-effective investment for me. They arrived promptly...Early, in fact, and in appropriate packaging (OEM cardboard box within an Amazon box). THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Climer

customer_reviews.title: Good asortment of forstner bits
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've been using them with my drill press to help with mortises that I then chisel out by hand. These have worked very, very well. No complaints at all! decent quality, price, and a variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: KunkohTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, and cut really well. I have another set made by a more "affordable" brand, and I have to say that these are far superior. The cuts are smoother and cleaner. I keep this set next to my high-end drill press, and the lesser set as quick connects to my hand held drill. If you're asking yourself... let me answer: yes, get them. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: I am Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great bit set, just go slow.
customer_reviews.text: Great bits! Just take it slow when using these and they will go for a long time. Have had no issues whatsoever going through oak with the largest bits in my drill press. After multiple holes in various woods with the same size bits over and over the shavings come out in continuous curls. Bits seem very true and straight in my press and don't wobble and aren't off center. Would definitely buy these again if they were every list or damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but bits are dull
customer_reviews.text: These bits are dull. Cuts are not clean ( see the photos). The Freud bits are a much better value if you plan to use it for drilling more than a couple of holes.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Great bit for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great set of value Forstner bits. These are my first set so I don't have others to compare my review on, but so far, they have worked great for my needs. I've used them in pine, pine plywood, and baltic birch so far and I love them. The case is quite nice for storing them also, I keep them on a little stand I have next to my drill press. Probably wouldn't hurt to spray a little oil or something on them to prevent rust.....something to think of when next i'm in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for through-holes, for a while.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a year now and they're dull. Only used them in pine and at slow speed for in a hand brace. The 1/2 and 3/4 are dull. Even when sharp they were only good for cutting through holes, not stopped, flat bottom holes. For occasional work or for soft woods, they're a decent value.
customer_reviews.author: Buyin' stuff

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it but it is clearly not the best set for clear cuts
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give these a try since my cmt tools set was lacking some sizes. Because of the square teeth form rather than conventional triangle form (like saw teeth or like cmt forstner bits) I expected a clearer cut but it was slightly worse than cmt. Given the price tag it is still a to go item I think.
customer_reviews.author: Mehmet

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not doing precision work, but use it a lot for dowels put in lap joints with a handheld drill. Just be careful with any forstner and a hand drill that they can grab the work piece, swing it around and hit you. They have stayed nicely sharp, and have no issues, but I'm infrequent user. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin K

customer_reviews.title: Overall a decent set for shop
customer_reviews.text: Some of the bits had nicks in the cutting areas and weren’t super sharp. Had to sharpen a few of the larger ones by hand. Cut pretty good, sharpen them for hardwoods to get smoother cuts. Sizes are spot on and accurate. All shanks are same size so changing between them in drill press is somewhat easier. Overall a decent set.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Vardeman

customer_reviews.title: Need to be sharpened before use.
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed that I need to go back and sharpen all of the bits. Kind of like HF quality. I wouldn't worry about it too much but mesquite does not like dull tools. I had bought a single freud bit a year ago and it cuts like butter, still my favorite. Porter cable single bits are nice, but they sacrificed on quality on my set. Had to buy these to build my gun stock, hope it doesn't mess up my project.
customer_reviews.author: HuntFishGolf

customer_reviews.title: Not sharpened
customer_reviews.text: First of all, Porter Cable has discontinued these Chinese made bits. I read a couple reviews before I ordered them that said they were dull and would not cut right out of the box. My thought was certainly that was something that could happen, but the chances that all of then would be dull would be slim. Well I was wrong. Every bit the this 14 piece set was anything but sharp. They were only about half ground. I'm returning them and won't be ordering any more. Shame on Porter Cable!
customer_reviews.author: dawn byus

customer_reviews.title: These bits will not disappoint!!!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy woodworking and have a well equipped shop with a wide variety of brands. Porter Cable is one of my favorite brands for woodworking tools. Their quality rarely disappoints and these bits are no exception. Smooth cutting, runs true, and leaves a clean hole.
customer_reviews.author: Contrary One

customer_reviews.title: Very dull, I am disappointed but not surprised
customer_reviews.text: The bits are not worth the cost. Very dull, I am disappointed but not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: William C Van Cleve

customer_reviews.title: A great set of drill bits
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. Just what I needed to finish a project. Wish I had purchased these before, but I am glad I own them now. I would recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lumber guy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these. I did based off the reviews and was very disappointed. After just 12 holes making candle holders out of pine wood. The bit was soooo dull. It is past the time that I can return the product. I would not waste your money on these. Spend a little more and go with Freud or Fisch bits.
customer_reviews.author: CenFloridaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, cuts quickly!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. All the bits were super sharp coming out of the box. Cut through cedar quickly for blue bird boxes! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: waterboy19

customer_reviews.title: Not Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I returned this set. The 1/4” bit struggled to cut through a 3/4” thick piece of maple. I bought a Freud bit that cut through the same piece of maple like butter.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as my first Forstner bit set, case is really great and handy and the bits are great quality. Been using this for a few years and the bits have come really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge O.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, many sizes, decent case - overall good value
customer_reviews.text: This set doesn’t disappoint. I wanted a decent quality set with many sizes and a decent case without spending a fortune. This fits the bill. Nice, clean cuts. As others have said, use a drill press and keep speed down and you won’t be disappointed. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LF Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: High value set
customer_reviews.text: As others have commented, not particularly sharp. I've only run a few bits into pine and they cut very nicely. Can't speak to hardwoods, but I could see that you might run into a bit of trouble. High value set though.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McAfoos

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Needed a set of forester bits for the road and these met and exceeded my expectations. They were a good value, worked well, and were not a strain on my back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ12

customer_reviews.title: These bits are perfect for my needs (amateur woodworker) solid and drill perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: These bits are perfect for my needs (amateur woodworker) solid and drill perfect holes the large bits are useful in hogging out wood to cut lap joints. Cut clean an easily. The case is sturdy with a clear cover which I like.
customer_reviews.author: PJones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Forstner Bits!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of Porter Cable Forstner bits to use with my new Porter Cable Drill Press I bought recently. These bits work great and are of good quality. I am very pleased with my purchase. These bits arrived on time and are in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this set, recommend buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have seen other sets like this but after using several sizes on a recent project I am impressed! Used with both my drill press and a hand held drill the holes bored were perfect. I envision using these for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: mcdtc

customer_reviews.title: Drills nice holes with a crisp edge like Forstner bits should
customer_reviews.text: Drills nice holes with a crisp edge like Forstner bits should. Not for production type use, but great for the occasional user.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wolter

customer_reviews.title: makes purdy holes
customer_reviews.text: i just wanted to counter sink some big washers so the threaded rod ends don't impale my legs when sitting on an upcycled-cedar bench i made. the bores are super clean, like furniture grade. also used to counter sink holes in my stair treads for some fastcap screws.
customer_reviews.author: krahnik

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Used this to build my create-a-bed side mount Queen Murphy bed . I had a hard time always remembering which bit was which sizes. It is labeled in the case but its hard to tell if the label goes with the bit on the left or right side. However each bit is labeled to make it easier. Nice, sharp out of the box. Carrying case is well made as well.
customer_reviews.author: QuarterInchOff

customer_reviews.title: Good bits!
customer_reviews.text: First-rate set of bits at a decent price. I've used three so far, all cut clean, fast and dig in without any added hand pressure.
customer_reviews.author: notfamous

customer_reviews.title: Super sharp bits
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp bits, look great and work great. If you use them correctly and at slow speed you shouldn't have any issues with them. Not sure what the poor reviews were talking about but based on what I received this product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kriff_23

customer_reviews.title: Made well, but still China!
customer_reviews.text: These bits are sharp.. look good but i hate that they are made in China.. but we will see how they cut.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, cutting edges have burrs
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, cutting edges have burrs, bad enough to need to be removed and honed. After they are sharpened the bits function flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Dull out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: Tried boring through softwoods. 1 1/2 bit was dull. I thought it may be a fluke, it happens. Every other bit I tried burned pine. Wouldn't hold an edge even after sharpening. Spend a little more to get better quality, I wish I would have
customer_reviews.author: Clay Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Solid set at a value price
customer_reviews.text: Great set with a great assortment of sizes. Packaged well. Buts have sizes on them and case has sizes stamped for easy to read and replace after use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peck

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: First time using this type of bit but saved me a lot of work. Hollowed out a turned box. Nice. Just go slow. I also worked my way up to the largest to make it easier on the bits.
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and durable bits
customer_reviews.text: These are very sharp bits. I have used them on several hardwoods and they cut like butter. Very pleased with the quality of these bits.
customer_reviews.author: pm

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great forstner set! Clean walls and edges and the cut is super smooth!
customer_reviews.author: David Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Dull to the degree of uselessness
customer_reviews.text: My set was one of the dull sets. Right out of the box, couldn’t cut through hardwood at all. Complete waste of money. Unfortunate for a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: RDS

customer_reviews.title: Value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Left a clean neat hole. But worked just fine in both a drill and drill press.
customer_reviews.author: Matt b

customer_reviews.title: a bit rough but good for general use
customer_reviews.text: If your a woodworker by trade you might want nicer bits, but you cant beat this set as a starter kit. Its so affordable and they are built strong.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pantelios

customer_reviews.title: They are ok. Kind of wonder why they put ...
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. Kind of wonder why they put two 1/4 inch bits in. I wish they had longer shanks as well
customer_reviews.author: ds

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was making the pikler triangle for my kid and needed this to make the holes for the dowels. There are total of 14 pieces and the case is okay, not too fancy not too bad. This is good for beginner, not sure for the professional.
customer_reviews.author: Anh Ton

customer_reviews.title: Dull. Need sharpening.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt believe other reviewers that said that these bits needed presharpening. My bits would not cut cleanly and without overheating. I hand sharpened them and currently they cut well. Its hard to believe that brand new bits would be dull.
customer_reviews.author: Max Strasburg

customer_reviews.title: Trash.  Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Used the two inch bit to drill one hole in a walnut board. The bit barely made it through, its totally dull now. This product is trash, don't buy it. Unfortunately I had it sitting longer than expected before use so I can't return it now. Shame on you!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Really a good deal
customer_reviews.text: I have used these bits a lot and they are well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Oklahoma traveler

customer_reviews.title: Very shape
customer_reviews.text: I bought this really for one reason, but I know I'll use them again many times....we recently cut the bottom of our Christmas tree to fit the room where it was going...the bit we cut off was about 7 inches long, I was about to throw it out when I thought I might make a candle holder out of it...so I bought these bits,drilled three holes to hold three night light candles and it worked brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: Deckieg

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: As expected these are not high dollar bits In wet wood they will build up some requiring cleaning wood fibers off
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: A real boring tool.
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong for the price, well made, reasonably sharp.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Januszewski

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product with multiple sizes all in one carrying case. Provides flexibility for wood working projects and they work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Have only used 1 bit a few times, but so far it cuts like butter
customer_reviews.author: Rich Gold

customer_reviews.title: Could value
customer_reviews.text: They are Porter-Cable. They case is heavy duty, holds the bits tightly so they wont slop around. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Curryfiend

customer_reviews.title: but the rest of the set is just fine. The product does what I needed it to ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the bits was NOT made properly and the end of it has a lot of flash and jagged spots, but the rest of the set is just fine. The product does what I needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Shoova

customer_reviews.title: Great bit set
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. He says they work great. I look forward to the many projects he will use them on.
customer_reviews.author: WilliK

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good set of forstner bits for the price. I needed a larger one for a router sled I'm making and saw this 14 piece set for such a good price I couldn't pass it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Porter-Cable Product meets Porter-Cable Standards
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing the company history of making durable products. The Forstner Bits are perfect for what I need, which is use on a near-daily basis. The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: An excellent bit set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My hole saws always seemed to burn their way through wood rather than drilling through. Then, I had to remove the slug of wood from inside the hole saw before burning another hole. Now I get clean holes (and a lot of sawdust) the first time and every time. This bit set is really great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Great set to have
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time. They are sharp and make a nice clean hole. They hold an edge pretty well, but as to be expected with hardwoods that they get dull faster that I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Best Forstner bit set for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a no brainer. You can either spend $15-$20 on individual larger bits, or just buy this set for the price of 2 or 3 individuals. They are also great bits. They are very sharp and have plenty of room for the shavings to escape. Just bite the bullet and get this set and be done with all future Forstner bit purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice set - Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Being a carpenter for years I had never purchased a complete Forstner set, only the bits I needed at the time. Well, when I needed a few I had not yet purchased I ran across this set. I have long been a Porter-Cable fan so it was pretty much a no brainer. I have found that since I have a complete set I use them more often and they do make a nice clean hole.
customer_reviews.author: Randy H. McKendry

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting abilities
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to hole drill one of our hardest hardwoods and they performed very well Hit a couple of nails but a quick sharpen (from YouTube video (which is fast and simple) and cuts great again Recommended for quality, price and useability
customer_reviews.author: Bob Shaw

customer_reviews.title: These work quite well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set of drills for making nice round holes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set with a card case.
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be of high quality. Have been using them for months and they are still sharp
customer_reviews.author: Richard Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: Seem like ok bits. I'm not one that has tons of money to throw around so that fit my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Martin D. Neilsen

customer_reviews.title: Great set that I use in woodworking projects
customer_reviews.text: Great set that I use in woodworking projects. Good variety of sizes for any project. Suggest using scrap wood underneath the hole you're drilling to minimize splitting on the backside of the cut.
customer_reviews.author: DanTheMan Creations

customer_reviews.title: Great Forstner Bit Set
customer_reviews.text: This Porter-Cable PC1014 Forstner Bit Set, 14 Piece is a great addition for my trades shop, I bought these mainly for bore hole for all my duck calls but have very many use other that boring holes for duck calls, but if you are a woodturner and are needing a quick way of boring a straight hole without using turning tools this is the set you should buy, I would recommend this to any woodworker.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: great bit set!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this forstner bit set for a few months now and can't find anything to complain about. It makes good holes, doesn't dull easily, and has a very nice range of sizes. I like the plastic case they came in - very easy to keep them organized and protected when not in use. Very solid bit set!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M Dann

customer_reviews.title: I find the quality of metal used for the cutting edge is not the greatest, but it is good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Having been a machinist for 10+ years, I find the quality of metal used for the cutting edge is not the greatest, but it is good quality for the price. I just wish it was high grade carbide, but obviously I did not pay to get that. Overall, the bits are satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Tangren

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the money
customer_reviews.text: Love em, have to keep them hidden so family doesn’t “borrow” them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Me gusta
customer_reviews.text: Great bits, seem durable. Drill at the right speed setting and you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: JBEstell

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: High quality bits. Sharp. Priced appropriately. I’m pleased with the value of this purchase. Using with drill press.
customer_reviews.author: MH Texas Runner

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They work as expected can’t say much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great set, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product better than expected. Great range of sizes. I had purchased the Freud set but wanted more larger sizes. This is it great set.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: A nice set that I use all the time
customer_reviews.text: Wide range of size choices, well made, precise, make a nice neat hole. These get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Drill Bits
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these bits a couple times but so far they've cut/peformed perfectly in my drill press. Nice set and a nice case to store them. Nothing negative to say at this point. Yes I would purchase again and yes I would recommend them to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: and the carrying case is fantastic. If you are looking for a consumer level ...
customer_reviews.text: They are sharp. Dead on accurate, and the carrying case is fantastic. If you are looking for a consumer level forstner bit set, this is your set!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Oxendale

customer_reviews.title: Okay for Home Owners - Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice drill bits for home work on a drill press. These will due for most average homeowners but I would not build custom furniture with these things. They tear at the wood hole edges and leave lots behind for you to clean up - but at this price and if you are not too picky - they do just fine. The case is a piece of plastic junk and starts to fall apart quickly when the snaps break off and the plastic starts to chip. Good hole drill bits for home use.
customer_reviews.author: KFTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bits / reliable brand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these bits to use in my drill press. They are very well made and, high quality, and sharp! The case they come on is also very nice for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy great bits
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bits for the price .....gonna find projects to use them now.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I lover Porter Cable tools. Every one I own is super heavy duty and these are no exception. Very sharp, very well made and they were not the most expensive set I looked at by a long shot. These are a great deal for the price, quality and the range of sizes
customer_reviews.author: C. Heartwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift or addition to any woodworkers tool box.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality set at an affordable price, and the case is just a bonus. Woodworkers must have.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Dobry

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome much better than China made Forstner bits that I have and they don't work well. Nice case Have yet to use
customer_reviews.author: Calvin A Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: clean boring holes with these
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought these years ago... clean, clean, clean boring holes with these. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: George M. Cockerham

customer_reviews.title: My second set for my other shop. Inexpensive and ...
customer_reviews.text: My second set for my other shop. Inexpensive and work well for my needs. I use them for bottle stopper blanks and tool handles
customer_reviews.author: Likes2tinker

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to have. Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought these and it has been working very well for me. It's still very sharp even after using it consistently for many projects. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: lee sin yoong

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Work just OK. Used to have no slip hex shank. Like my last porter cable set. Not anymore. Spend a bit more for if your the advanced woodworker and you will get a bit set that drills faster without chip out.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN BAXTER

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made and seems to hold its sharpness. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've just learned that forstner bits are better than spades. I like the flat bottom and clean outer circle.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bui

customer_reviews.title: Great Bit Set, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, Great Price. What can I say, they are supposed to drill holes and they do it very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph T. Katt

customer_reviews.title: Great bits
customer_reviews.text: Have used several now and all cut very well. Great value for the price
customer_reviews.author: David White

customer_reviews.title: Quality bits
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of these bits. Works very well for me.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth trimble

customer_reviews.title: work great they make nice clean holes
customer_reviews.text: have used these quite a bit, work great they make nice clean holes, which is what bits should do.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff & Rae

product_meta.title: PORTER-CABLE Forstner Bit Set, 14-Piece (PC1014)
product_meta.description:
Includes 1/4 in. Forstner Bit, 3/8 in. Forstner Bit, 1/2 in. Forstner Bit, 5/8 in. Forstner Bit, 3/4 in. Forstner Bit, 7/8 in. Forstner Bit, 1 in. Forstner Bit, 1-1/8 in. Forstner Bit, 1-1/4 in. Forstner Bit, 1-3/8 in. Forstner Bit, 1-1/2 in. Forstner Bit, 1-5/8 in. Forstner Bit, 2 in.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Porter-Cable Forstner bits have optimized cutting angles for flat bottom holes. The have and open tooth design that drills clean fast holes and creates a fine smooth finish. These bits are made of hardened steel for durability and a long service life.
feature_bullets: Optimized cutting angles for flat bottom holes
Open tooth design for clean fast holes
Designed for durability and long life
Includes common sizes from 1/4 to 2 Inch
